content.detailedDescription: Me and some other inmates or what they call residents as they call it were on the yard probaly around 12am or later and we saw the orbs of lights over the trees right over the tree tops right outside the gates and everyone stared and tried to say it was this it was that but ive never seen anything like it in my life and the next day their were ufo sightings on t.V called arizona lights and i was like thats the same hing we saw outside.
content.summary: It was exciting their were plenty of witnesses who were in the transitional center with me and the orbs of lights were like 6-10 and it hovered over the tree tops for more than an hour and it wasnt even that far away,.

content.detailedDescription:
Small bright orb traveling from left to right, passed under a star. quickly turned up then seemed to get faster and traveled out of sight as if it was rapidly acsending into deep space.

three of us were outside looking for it, where we usually see it. it appeared after about 15 minutes in a direction a pattern we havent seen before. it was visible for about a minute. we went out several times after that had not seen it. its been getting the attention of many people in the neighborhood.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Small starlike orb moving from left to right passed under a star turn up then acsended out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I did not see it till i saw it on my picture. i have other picture seconds apart and object does not show up.
content.summary: I did not see it till i saw it on my picture.

content.detailedDescription: I don't sleep well and often get up in the middle of the night and walk around outside.  when i looked east, i noticed a "star" i hadn't seen before; then, i noted that it was hovering/moving ever so slowly over downtown dade city.  the object was just a very bright light.  it stopped suddenly, just before getting to me, then it exploded into what looked like the star of bethlehem (ok, yes, i'm baptist and it's the only thing i have in mind that relates to what it looked like)...Once it exploded, it zoomed off to the se at a rate of speed that was so fast that my eyes could barely keep up with it...Then, it was gone.
content.summary: It looked like a star, but at first it was hovering before zooming off to the se

content.detailedDescription: I don't sleep well and often get up in the middle of the night and walk around outside.  when i looked east, i noticed a "star" i hadn't seen before; then, i noted that it was hovering/moving ever so slowly over downtown dade city.  the object was just a very bright light.  it stopped suddenly, just before getting to me, then it exploded into what looked like the star of bethlehem (ok, yes, i'm baptist and it's the only thing i have in mind that relates to what it looked like)...Once it exploded, it zoomed off to the se at a rate of speed that was so fast that my eyes could barely keep up with it...Then, it was gone.
content.summary: It looked like a star, but at first it was hovering before zooming off to the se

content.detailedDescription: Around 11:30 last night i went on my porch for a cigarette. i noticed it being a little foggy outside and one star glowing really bright. i went outside to look at it and the second i went outside, i saw what appeared to be two red orbs floating up above my fence line. they were going up in a wave like pattern. at first, the only logical possibility i thought was maybe a weather balloon with flares or something, but these things were moving thousands of feet in seconds, and gracefully. i ran inside and woke up my wife. when we went back outside the orbs were brighter and were still going up, but in more of a straight line. one was a little bit behind the other and started fading. by the time the one faded away the other one started fading. when i could barely see it, it started changing direction and got bigger. i realized that it was getting bigger because it lowered and it came down to where it was about the size of a dime. it changed direction and glided right above us. when it got to it's closest point you could clearly see a disk shape with about fifteen or twenty red lights lining the edge of it, glowing the bottom a little bit.  it looked like gravity had absolutely no affect on it. it was completely silent. if it was a plane or helicopter we would have easily heard it, and i have never seen a plane or helicopter shaped like that before. we watched it as it got brighter and moved faster. it went over us 19, and after it got to the point to where my roof was blocking our view we ran out front. when we got there it disappeared. i'd like to note that every time it changed direction, moved faster, or raise it got brighter. almost like the brightness was linked to it's energy use.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Disc shape red lights around edge

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my terrace having a cigarette at about 5:23 am and each night i star gaze.
when i seen what i first thought it was a plane a moving light. when i realized that this moving light could not be a plane because it's flight path was east to southwest but zig-zaging (up & down path)...Amazing.
and no sound at all...It was weird to see this type of movement...And wonderful.

thank you
(name and e-mail moved to fi box) cms 09/14/11 07:30 cst flg
content.summary: Strobing light, moving in a fluttering motion.

content.detailedDescription: I work night as a custodian and typicaly have to go out side to take out the trash. i alway take my camera every where i go inacase i see something neat. so anyways i was taken the trash out and noticed a blinking star in the sky pulled out my camera and took a picture. at the time i didnt know what it was and i still dont know exactly what it is but this is what i seen when i up loaded it after work.
content.summary: Blinking star in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos of a water fall in the west side of palm springs didn't see or hear anything when i uploaded the photo i noticed it. my camera lens was clean it was on and off raining but not raining at the time of the photo being taken. i was at the end of a street near the end of alajo st. in palm springs facing san jacinto mountain.
content.summary: Black bullet shap only photographed

content.detailedDescription:
i am a lorry driver and was on the a50 heading from derby to the m1 motorway when i noticed what i initially thought was an aircraft due east midlands airport being in the area.
the object caught my attention as it was pulsating through a range of different colours, it was then that i realised it couldn't be an plane as they only use red, green and white for their beacons/strobes.
also it moved very randomly at incredible speed and seemed to change direction instantly which i haven't even seen military aircraft do.
it was heading away from me and then as it got a few miles from me headed back some way and then started to hover over a field approx 1/2 mile away.
i felt intruigue, excitment and in a way felt i could be seeing things but i know i wasn't (if that makes sense).
content.summary: Star like object near east midlands airport

content.detailedDescription: Possible depiction of ufo crash site and observations by native american's at rochester creek utah (carved in rock art / petroglyphs) circa 500 to 700 ad. see attached photos and notes.
content.summary: Possible ufo crash pedicted in rock art (petroglyphs) by native american's 500+ years ago at rochester creek utah.

content.detailedDescription:
On  9-12-2011, i saw 4  changing objects in the sky that changed shape  multiple times; then descended to the earth being the focal point of where a lot of light or lighting followed 15-30 minutes latter. to start this i would like to say that i know aliens exist. my manager wasn't sure to mention it at work, but then i surprised him with little images i drew with a marker to tell him what i saw fire off into the distance at crown hill after 8pm when i was out for a walk. he & others might think their alien but i don't believe this.

i'll explain

at crown hill maybe a block from the tower of memories that giant cremation tower near the public lake theirs a cemetery. i saw 4 moving objects. first hey were lighting up then dimming down. they disappeared then reappeared one after another so i think their was no more then 5. then these object's came to form like a +, no not a plus i mean they were moving in a circle as if on  wheel. they formed tails when they moved together, then they came to form a cross.  

they moved & became like discs but like baby galaxies
it didn't seem like technology but something in nature. not like the wind but very supernatural. (not devin)

these galaxies reminded me of the falun wheel, in falun dafa's teachings of the buddha school. i think their a warning for human kind or for those who witnessed them not to miss the truth  that people don���t see with distractions in our world these days.

i know their are aliens but i don't care. i cultivate buddha hood so theirs an issue of nobility. this takes great importance to me so i wanted to share.

anyways my name is jerrod i witnessed this & wanted to share
it was north of wheat ridge as if 50 or a 100 miles away yet they were still visible as they descended fading from their flam likeness before seeming to hit the groined. then light was flashing maybe like silent lightning. i saw a black helicopter flying that way 15 minutes latter..

if people are covering up these things i find it ridicules!
human beings are very special & we have nothing to gain by working with the grays. human beings can cultivate buddha hood & return to the heavens yet those beings belong just down here! this is my thought of the 4 changing objects that left tails when moving as ball's & formed into a cross then turned into discs like the ones shown in falun buddha law.

these thoughts are my own. falun dafa healed my spine from scoliosis many years ago so i can walk full time. it teaches truth-compassion-tolerance

thank you for reading

(name moved to fi box) cms 09/14/11 07:41 cst flg


oh yes. i know of those who care deeply for god or have mead a habit of the formalities of realigion. i think maybe this phonamena is for you to
look wihin to e saved.

i cultivate buddha hood, so this is just my thought

ps, maybe pictures or videos will turn up
content.summary: After a man at my mcdonalds job mentioned seeing  objects in the sky at work i pulled out a paper & said did they look like this! i wanted to share my experience & thoughts of these objects. they formed a wheel then a cross

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my car returning home with my wife at 10:45 pm. suddenly i noticed a triangle with curved lines orange-red light, over the buildings. i stoped my car and i record for about 30 sec with my cell phone. it looks like fire but with no flash it was moving with one side front and the top of the corner leading. no sound. flew straight line over the buildings and finally dissapear near to the horizon in the clouds.
my first thought was that looks like the fire of a little hot air balloon but the speed was much higher. i dont think it was plane due to luck of noise and the size and color it was not like thw lights of airplane i have see. maybe a meteor but has no tail and flew straight line no descent.
content.summary: Triangle orange-red light flew straight line over buildings for 1min 30sec

content.detailedDescription: Three buddies and me were having a smoke on the front porch at 1:30 am. we were talking about some of the sightings we have seen before and i made the statement "our world is about to change." at that very moment we heard these jet like noises start up instantly.My friend walked off the porch and looked up and started to jump around yelling at us asking what it was so we all got up off the porch and looked and saw a boomerang shaped object directly above us moving so slow it looked as if it was hovering in the sky.The lights blinked randomly and noise was so loud i could feel the ground shake.As it moved through the sky we lost sight of it behinds some trees so we ran to the street to get a better look and we could see stars in between the lights like nothing was even there completely invisible except for the red lights.As it kept moving on its straight path we lost sight of it behind the dense tree line.
content.summary: Red blinking lights at random sound like 10 jets flying above me and comlpetely invisible the speed was about 25 to 30 mph

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside at about 9pm est on 8/29/2011.  i alone normally take out multiple loads of trash to the edge of our driveway on monday nights, but this particular night my wife helped out since there was such a large load.  

as we were finishing up, at approximately 9:14pm, i looked up to the sky to look at the stars.  it was a very clear night with absolutely no clouds.  here are the exact stats for that time period:

cloudless, clear night, visibility 10+ miles, 79f, wind nw @ 3mph, 33% humidity, uv index of 0, dew point 47.

i have an uncanny ability to pick out satellites since i've been doing so for the past 25+ years and started as a kid.  at the very moment i looked up, and in the very location my eyes first fixated, i saw what appeared to be a satellite moving in a constant albeit slower than usual path from right to left.  it had the same very small shape and brightness (dull) as a satellite so i assume similar altitude.  there was absolutely no sound.
 
within 10 seconds of watching it, it pulsated to incredibly large, bright white ball of light.  it grew in brightness at least 500-1,000 times if not more and within a second returned back to it's original size and luminosity.  amazed i yelled over to my wife who was standing just feet away in the opening of our garage door.  i quickly told her what happened, relocated the object and had her fixated on it.  within several seconds, the objected pulsated again in the exact same manner.  my wife witnessed it and couldn't believe it either.  once again it returned to the satellite-like object and continued it's path.  we followed it until it was out of site.

so again, the pulse occurred twice, each within 30 seconds of each other and each lasting for approximately 1 second.  i know of no other object that can do what this object did at that altitude and to that degree of brightness.  the altitude was much greater than that of an airplane or helicopter.  there was no sound, no other colors and no blinking lights.

to note, before i submitted this report today, i performed a search in the mufon database.  there is an identical report on the exact same day in ga.  you may want to attempt to triangulate the time and location between our two events so that we can confirm the path of the object and determine if they indeed are the same.  thank you.
content.summary: Star-like object pulsates twice with very bright white light

content.detailedDescription: I have a video of it
content.summary: 2 green light turning as if they were tail lights in the air

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in our pool talking and facing east, towards the back of our house. i looked up and what at first i thought was a commercial aircraft flying north around a heading of 030 degrees. i thought that it was flying to slow and to low and i started to look at it a little closer. there were no wings or tail section and it didnt make a sound. as it flew north a tree got in my way so i moved over a little to my right to keep watching it and it was then that it vanished. i then looked to my right and here comes another one. it was the same thing. it was like the first one was towing the second one. i no that airplanes don't fly that low or that close to each other. i would like to talk to someone about this.
content.summary: Two cigar shaped objects

content.detailedDescription:
I observed for over two hours using binoculars over 25 pairs of lights in a very large circle over head.

to the naked eye they looked like one craft, but there were two crafts close together. one craft stayed in place and the second one would move away a distance, stop and then move back toward the other craft.
the circle over head covered many miles and the objects were at different 
altitudes.

the two that i observed mostly were east of albuquerque and north east of the sandia mountain range. there was no airline traffic going into or out of abq. during this time,that i could see.

i counted at least 50 craft (25 pairs), but there were more than that.
the moon was very bright during the sitting and the two crafts i watched were very bright with white, red, orange and violette color.
there was one other person with me during part of the evening. i stopped viewing at about 1:30 am.

i went outside with my dog at about 11:00 pm and that is when i noticed the two brightest lights. i came back in and got my binoculars and could make out the lights like i have described. the night sky here in placitas is normally very clear at night. 

i will be checking again tonight to see if they are there.
content.summary: Viewed over 50 ufo's during a 2 1/2 hour period
content.locationName: Placitas North of Albuque, New Mexico

content.detailedDescription: Me and a buddy was driving on passaconway road and all of sudden out of now where we saw something that looked like a ball of fire moving very slow  in the sky and it went for a good 10 min and it kept on getting higher in the sky.  it was a basketball size and bright ornage and red and it was at about tree line height. then after a few min it faded away it was medded up and if any one could help me with this it would be great thank.  i was kinda freaking out because i never ever seen anything like it before.  we drove to another field fast then we saw it fade out
content.summary: Fireball

content.detailedDescription:
Hello guys,
this is kind of a long story, spanning the last 4 years, but i'll do my best to explain. my grandparents own a farm in drakes branch, virginia. my father, my uncles and i all hunt on this land every year. mainly for turkey and dear, but we do shoot the occasional bear too. about 3 and a half to 4 years ago, we started to sew crops and put up digital game cameras throughout the property. for the first 3 years we had the cameras activated, all we ever recorded were some nice bucks, more than a few doe, and a couple black bears from time to time. about a year ago, that all changed.
we started getting some really weird photos last year with those game cameras (some of which i have attached) and my purpose of writing to you now is to see if someone can offer a reasonable explanation as to what is happening.
i must say that we've never shook hands with aliens, our houses aren't haunted and we've never eaten lunch with bigfoot. so we are all skeptical about these photos. however, there is enough documentation on our end to say that "something" is definitely happening and we're so curious as to what it is, that we have decided to explore all possibilities, even the more exotic ones. with that said, let me explain some of the weirdness and allow you to form an opinion of your own.
the cameras we use are moultrie 4mpx digital game cameras. we have 3 of them in total. they were placed in 3 separate corners of the farm. the cameras have only 2 ways they can be triggered. the first way is with movement. the second way is with a heat signature. the cameras have an infrared sensor on them that detects variations in temperature. but the manual to the cameras says that both sensors (movement and infrared) are only good for about 45 feet away. anything further out than 45 feet should "technically" not trigger the camera to take a photo. however, we started getting photos of some really crazy looking "orbs" (for lack of a better word) on only 1 of the cameras we had setup. the photos were very strange considering the fact that whatever had triggered the camera appeared to be at least 250+ feet away. we erased the images and changed the cameras around so that an identical type, but totally different camera, was placed in the spot that we had taken the strange photos. then the "broken" camera (we thought it must have had a defect) was switched to the spot we had taken the "different" camera from. of course the broken camera was not broken at all, and ceased to take pictures of anything out of the ordinary once it was switched. it did capture many pictures, but only of the passing dear or bear. the pics were perfectly clear and had nothing in them that looked like what we had seen the same camera take photos of when it was in the other spot.
well, the photos of the strange lights didn't stop with the different camera. actually, they became more frequent once the newer camera was placed in the sweet-spot. we began to accumulate even more strange photos of these orbs, as well as some light phenomenon that isn't spherical, so i can't call it an orb. these photos we did not erase. we kept them because of the same reason the cat got killed, curiosity. playing the detectives, we immediately switched the 3rd and final camera we had to the spot the photos were being taken, and in turn, we moved the 2nd camera which had captured these images to another spot. this, of course, resulted the same way as when we switched the cameras the first time.
we caught a few more images but then the images abruptly stopped. well, we did capture "normal" photos, but nothing out of the ordinary. the abnormal images did start up again, but only after about a month or so. during that month of downtime, we started examining the photos more closely and realized that there seemed to be a cycle. the one thing the photos all had in common was that they only occurred in low light. you can see a country-mile in the full moonlight. but the lights never came on nights where there was a full moon. nor a half moon! the only time it happened was when there was little to no light in the fields. however, some nights we had a bigger moon and the lights did come, but it was extremely overcast and no moonlight could be seen. other than that, there appears to be no rhyme nor reason as to when the lights will occur. but we do know where. they always occur in the same field between sun down and sun up.
before the lights kicked-up again. we invested in some better cameras. the newer cameras had the same sensor detection, but these new cameras were 8mpx and had the ability to take video. the new cameras also had a feature that helped our cause greatly. they had a battery that held for (up to) 1 year. however, when we set the video cameras, the batteries began to deplete almost instantly. sometimes we would have dead batteries within a few days. other times it would take a few weeks. but regardless, the batteries would be dead in no more than a month. we had bought 3 of these video cameras in total. so we decided to start putting more than one in the area of the phenomenon. what resulted was the batteries in all cameras dieing within days. also we had a few cameras cease to operate at all, totally fried! this did not stop the fact that the phenomenon was still being captured with the still cameras. no battery problems or malfunctions with them.
we then saw some pics that really were cool. the still camera had captured a black bear that was no more than 5 feet away from the camera, but there was an orb behind the bear. we also have a pic that looks as if there is "something" (not going to speculate here) in the lower half of the light-beam. very strange, in deed, but not even close to evidence of the paranormal. after all, it could be some weird weather condition or something of the sort causing these strange lights.
then one day, we were talking to my grandmother, who is very old but well within the sane-range. she told a very odd story that captivated our imaginations in such a way that we started actually considering something other than a natural reason for the lights. she told us a story about when she was only a little girl and had lived only 200 yards from the spot where the photos were being captured. she explained that her and her sister had seen the same strange lights in that field and had always been frightened of them. her recollection of the lights was vague, but she did remember one event that she said she'd never forget. one night the lights had been particularly bright. her and her sister were so scared that they had huddled together under the covers of their bed. in the morning, they had ventured in to the field and discovered their uncle had died in the barn of a heart attack. they immediately told their mother who, in turn, called their father to investigate the situation. their father found the body of his brother and uttered only a small sentence, that my grandmother said she'd never forgotten. he said "must have seen what was makin' those lights out here!". that story was so amazing to us that we decided that if "we" couldn't get better evidence and solve the mystery, maybe it'd be better to ask the professionals. so that is why i am contacting you now.
some of our better photos are still on the sd card from the cameras. so i couldn't show you one photo in particular that is pretty awesome. it shows extremely bright lights in the field. but they must be 200 yards in the distance, which is impressive, considering we know these cameras like the backs of our hands, and it seems impossible to us that photos would be taken of something so far in the distance. i'm sure we have new photos as well, but we have to wait until the data is retrieved from the cameras, which are active at this time.
my father also noticed a few places in the field where there are cylindrical depressions in the ground accompanied by dead vegetation. we don't want to jump to conclusions, but it is what it is.
the phenomenon only seemed to occur during the autumn and winter months. but that's probably because we only use the game cameras at that time. it is almost that time again and we'd really like a better explanation as to what is happening. if someone out there has any idea, please let us know. i'm currently in germany preparing for a european tour with my band. my father asked me to contact you because he has no idea how to use a computer. i have included the appropriate contact information in the above fields.
content.shape: Cigar,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: Many strange lights caught by game camera in virginia

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Canton, mi / 9-11-2011 - first two u.F.O.S seen between 9:30 - 9:40 p.M.

my 12 year old son and i were walking our dog around our neighborhood and when we almost reached the end of a court, i happened to look up into the south sky and noticed a very brilliant star-like light approaching( heading north ).  it looked slightly smaller than a golf ball from where we were standing.  i told my son to look at it.  we were both stunned and we both started saying "wow... what is that ?"  "oh... my god !" etc.  i said, "that is definitely a u.F.O." and he agreed, as we had never seen such a large orange/amber moving star-like object like this, in our lives !  it was coming toward us and i grabbed my son's arm and started backing up because it was very different, so i thought it could be dangerous.  we both just starred at it as it seemed to hover in one spot for a while, and then it began to arc( take a curved path ) toward the east.  as we watched, it began to slowly shrink / dim out.  it looked as though it was getting smaller and less bright until it was just a dot without any light at all... and then it vanished.  we did not lose sight of it, it just disappeared !  then my son yelled out that there was another one.  i looked around and seen the exact same thing, in the exact same area that we seen the first one.  again...  it was slightly smaller than a golf ball, extremely bright... brilliant.  it looked like a huge orange/amber moving star, just like the first one did, and it also seemed to stop and hover, but this one moved slightly slower than the first one, but it did everything else the same. ( no blinking lights, did not blink, just brilliant ( flickering ? ) bright orange / amber light... like a huge star )  it started to arc toward the east and then started shrinking / dimming... until it looked like a dot in the sky, without any light... and then it was gone.  vanished !!!  just like the first one did.  we waited to see if another one would appear, but did not see anything, so we ran home with our dog and told my husband what we had seen.  he asked us to show him where we had seen it ( all the while making fun of us ), so we ( my husband, son, dog and i )went back outside, and my husband noticed a star-like ( slightly larger than a large star ) moving object, up in the sky, moving from west to east.  when he pointed it out to me, i told him it was the same color, but much, much smaller        ( farther away ).  my husband is a major skeptic ( engineer ), but he did take a picture with his cell phone camera ( yet to see the pic ).  he also did make the remark that the color was unusual, and he did not believe it was an airplane or a helicopter.  he also said he had never seen anything like it.  i told him that what he was seeing was sooooo much smaller       ( farther away ), that it was not as shocking as the first two that my son and i had witnessed.  we ended up losing sight of this "far away" one, so my husband did not see it shrink / dim out and disappear, but at least he did see the orange / amber color of it.  we then took him to the exact spot that the first two appeared at.  we did not see them again.
this was a very strange sighting that my son and i will never forget !!!
if there is anyone else in the canton, mi area that has also witnessed this /these u.F.O.S, please feel free to contact me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Canton, mi - large star-like orange/amber u.F.O. shrinking / dimming / vanishing...

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting out back watching the stars @ around 11:00(looking east) and we saw this weird light over the mountain range, i grabbed my camera and started to take pictures. could not figure out what it was, first thinking it was a plane but then realized that couldn't be possible, that i know of. when i first saw the object i was intrigued, wanting to know what it was. as time went on i began feeling anxious and decided to go inside, and go to sleep.
content.summary: One bright light, many smaller lights around it, hovered in and out up and down, almost looked like it was emitting a light from beneath.

content.detailedDescription:
My nephew and his friend were next-door at my mother���s house and saw a brilliant orange orb, fly slowly across the back field (approximately 500ft). they watched it move across the sky from the south-east, and watched until it disappeared over the north north-west horizon. my mother says the orb was approximately the size of a small house, and was at a distance of about ��� mile. during the time the orb moved through the sky, it slowly dimmed to black, then returned to its original, brilliant orange. 

the boys (ages 12 and 13) ran back home and told me what they had seen. i expressed disappointment that i had not seen the object and told them the next time they see something like that, to come and tell me. about ten minutes later, one of the boys came in crying, saying there was a ufo outside. i looked out the window and told my husband to grab the camera.

as soon as i got outside i was amazed by how brilliant the orange orbs were. my nephew and i ran out into the pasture to get a clear view away from the trees. there were four brilliant orange orbs, slowly flying west, approximately 500-1000ft above us, within a quarter of a mile. they moved silently ��� three of them in a perfect triangle formation, with a fourth orb off the lower left. 

we watched the objects for approximately 10 minutes, until they slowly dimmed to a blue-white, and then to black. this was just after sunset, and the moon was bright, making it difficult to track their movement after they finally faded to black. during the last few minutes that we were able to track them, they appeared to be solid black spheres.

my husband was able to take a few photographs, but the night-vision setting obscured the photographs. he was only able to get one good picture, which does not show the fourth orb off to the lower-left. the orbs look elongated in the photo because the camera was shaking.

i was excited, because my brother and nephew are always spotting ufos in the area, and i never get to see them. i go to sleep early, so i don���t get to do much sky-watching. my nephew ran out into the field, waving and shouting, trying to get them to land. my husband was simply dumbfounded, being totally unable to explain what he was witnessing.

i am an air force veteran, and former aircrew. my husband is still in the military and is also aircrew. we both have many years of experience observing aircraft. neither my husband nor i, were able to attribute the orbs to any known aircraft.

in the following weeks, we have witnessed similar orange orbs flying across the horizon at a distance. the objects are orange with none of the standard aircraft lights. the objects can be tracked across the horizon until they slowly fade to blue-white, and then black, over a period of about five minutes. my husband, who is flight-crew, cannot explain the slow dimming of these lights to any type of military procedure. 

spotting these orange orbs in the early evening is now common-place, and no one gets too worked up about it when they���re spotted. in fact, i���ve told my nephew not to bother alerting me unless he sees them doing something out of the ordinary.  

i would like to add that in the early 1990���s, about 10 members of my family saw a triangle ship with red lights (three on each end and one in the center), hover above the back woods (approximately 1/4 mile away at 200ft). the object spun slowly for about 5 minutes, and then shot straight up into the air in an instant.
content.summary: Orange orbs in triangle formation close up

content.detailedDescription:
On july 17, 2011:

i was setting up my telescope to try some digital astrophotography.  this fact really has nothing to do with what i saw other than it is why i was outside at the time.  i was with my daughter, who is 4 in my front yard.  it is the best place to use my telescope when i use it at home because i am somewhat shielded from street lights.  i am not an expert in aircraft, or satellites, or meteors and meteorites, but i am very confident in my ability to identify objects i see in the sky by those categories.  i have even managed to see a weather balloon on the horizon.  it is not abnormal for me to be outside looking at the sky.  literally every time the sky is clear at night, i am looking up.

at about 9:45 pm, i had just managed to connect my digital camera to my telescope.  i was getting ready to practice tacking photos of stars, and later on that night if i could stay up late enough i planned to try and photograph m31.  i noticed out of the corner of my eye a light.  it was in between the roof of my house and my neighbors roof in the distance.  where i noticed it first was in the vicinity of polaris moving from west to east pretty slowly.  it was bright red, maybe with a little orange.  i am not sure how to describe what i saw perfectly, but this should help you understand.  my first thought was that it must be the iss.  it seemed bigger and the color was and brightness were way off, but the way it consistently moved across the sky was similar to a satellite or the iss.  i watched it for probably 45 seconds until i decided it was odd enough to go inside and get my wife.  so my daughter and i went in to get her, and when we came back outside, i was unable to locate it again.  after a minute or two of discussion, she went back inside and my daughter and i went back to the telescope.  i thought that it could possibly have been the space station or a satellite that just happened to catch sunlight in a way that would cause what i saw, and didn't think much more of it. approximately 10 mintutes after the first sighting, my daughter, who had apparently been staring where we had seen it the first time, called out to me that she saw it again.  i looked, and sure enough at pretty much the same starting point as before, the exact same thing was there, moving in the same direction, west to east at the same speed.  this time i really tried to get a feel for what it was, and again i really couldn't come up with a good answer.  so again, i went to get my wife, and when we returned, it was gone.  

after thinking about it for a while, i checked online to see sighting times and locations of the iss, and some satellites.  nothing i found matched the time and location.  running over scenerios of things that may be able to create what i saw, i thought it was possible that they may be some sort of chinese lantern.  when i say this, i don't want it to sound convincing though.  because i am not convinced that is what i saw.  so the next day i reached out to some people in the astronomy community, and we came to the same conclusion together.  it must have been some sort of chinese lantern.  on a side note, i live close to a major airport, and the 171rst air refueling wing of the airforce, and the 911th airwing as well.  so between all of this, i just put it aside in my head as something explainable by something along the lines of airports being close by or chinese lanterns. 

august 12, 2011

about 4 weeks later, on august 12th, at about 9:00pm i was in geneva, ohio.  my wife, and daughters were eating at an outdoor restaurant (old firehouse winery) when again i noticed the same light moving through the sky.  this time i was able to show my wife.  the light was moving almost directly overhead, this time east to west.  i watched it until it dissapeared behind some trees about 30 seconds later.  i started explaining that i had seen it before, and that it was strange to see it again.  about 5 or so minutes had gone by, and it again drifted out of the conversation when i looked up, and saw it again.  in the same path and trajectory, with the same color and speed.  

i personally ruled out the space station or shuttles.  i am completely convinced it was not a satellite.  it was definitely not a meteor or meteorite.  i am not sure what it was to be honest.  it has been weighing on my mind for a month now.  i usually have no trouble identifying what i see in the sky.  i doubt that this story in itself is spectacular enough to really warrant your attention.  however, maybe others have seen the same thing, and this could help determine what was seen.
content.summary: Two seperate lights, on two seperate occasions in seperate locations that i was unable to identify.

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing with my brother on the great river guadiana in badajoz spain on thursday 9th june 2011.
it was a wonderful sunny day only a couple of whispy clouds in sky. it was around 4pm and i was becoming a bit tired and thinking of packing up when i lazily lay back and rested enjoying the sunshine. i was staring straight up, i suppose 90 degrees to horizon.
 i must have lay like that for five minuets or so when from behind me and directly into my field of vision a clear black disc shape moved quite rapidly across the sky along the line of the river. my imidiate thought was wtf is that!!?? 
as noted above it was roughly asprin sized.
 i called to my brother who was engrossed in his fishing to look pointing at it. 
it took me quite by surprise, i sat up  as it moved down the river and towards the horizon.
 as it was sunny there was some glare off the water and my eyes took a moment to readjust i picked it up again and pointed to it but my brother only saw some birds down river and suggested that was what it was.
i just put it to the back of my mind for a while but i keep thinking about it and what it could have been.
 i dont remember seeing aircraft in the area at all that day. although there were lots of birds on the river.
 if it was a bird that is the first and fastest disc shaped bird i have ever seen!
content.summary: Clear disc shape moving across clear blue sky badajoz spain

content.detailedDescription:
On march 28th 2011 at about 330am i was watching tv and i went outside to get my cat and usually i look at the stars and try to find the moon and constellations, while i was doing this right above me head i noticed what to me looked like a shooting star so im watching it and it fades out of sight within maybe 15 secounds and then it appears back and its circling about a half inch from where it fades it circles about 7-8 times and then it just is gone soo i found my cat and went back to watching tv but i nvr 4got that and finally i got on here to report it incase i did witness something 

chico california march 28th 2011

it wasnt stormy or cloudy there were an abundance of stars, after i saw it i was really excicted and like freaking out cause its fun to see shooting stars but to see one that starts to go in circles that was amazing
content.summary: Circling shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
My room mate and i were going out for dinner about 8pm 9-12-11.  his house is in a tree strewn neighborhood just off 44th and pecos.  when we rounded the corner and faced due south we both saw three brightly lit orbs to the south south west leaving what looked like tails of sparks flying over the tree tops.  our first reaction was one of disbelief and excitement.  they were some distance away, anywhere from 500-1500' agl, and appeared to be near the mile high football stadium during a broncos game.  one of them appeared to be falling, or stationary while the other two were changing directions and flying around each other.  they left brilliant trails of sparks, and their movements were smooth and gentle.  i have seen footage on you tube from oxford uk and california that matched what we saw tonight.

we were driving towards the lights, and eventually lost sight of the objects through the trees, and stopped the car to find a better vantage point.  i had line of sight on them for a good 45 seconds out of a minute or two we were observing them.  i called 911 to report what i was seeing and make sure there was a log of our sighting.  we knew what we were looking at when we saw it- just like the footage we have seen of ufo's elsewhere.  the only thing that might explain what happened is if it were somehow part of the halftime show, but honestly, i don't think this small town has the sack to pull something like that off.

i hope we are not the only ones to see this- and i hope some footage pops up.  i will be checking the local news to see if they have any info.
content.summary: Three flaming orbs with sparkling tails interact over denver

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 10:30 pm tonight, september 12, 2011 in pinebluff, nc, i looked toward the full moon and saw a very large, bright blue orb traveling at a steady, slow rate from north to south and approximately 10 degrees below the elevation moon.  when the object had passed approximately 7-10 degrees to the southern side of the moons path, it stopped and hovered, and appeared to remain motionless for approximately 2-3 minutes.  

after the time of remaining motionless, it then moved from it's position northward along the same elevation...At quick, but steady pace...And covered approximately 15 degrees of arc over perhaps 5-7 seconds.  it then stopped to the northern side of the moons path, and hovered in that position for perhaps another 3 minutes. it was in this position that i was able to capture the pictures of the object with my phone. 

the object then simply disappeared from view.  no flash, pulse,movement,  or anything...It just disappeared. 

the object was larger than any star or planet....Approximately 1/8 to 1/6 the diameter of a full moon.  it's color was an extremely bright blue, and it seemed to have an irregular pulsing in intensity.  i am positive there is no possibility of this being a mistaken star, planet, weather balloon, airplane, or helicopter of any kind  the skies tonight were crystal clear, cloudless, and without any heat distortion.

there was no sound emitted of any kind.

i have no way to estimate the object size, distance, or altitude as it appeared as just a glowing orb hovering in the air. 

i'm a pretty avid star gaze and satellite watcher, and in twenty years of looking up, i've never seen anything like ithis before.  what first caught my eye was the brightness and size of the thing.  it couldn't be missed if you looked up in it's direction.  it actually had the kind of appearance of what pictures of earth taken from outer space look like...An intensely bright blue orb.   truthfully, it caught me off guard, and it took a couple minutes for me to process that i was seeing something i couldn't explain.  fortunately, i dug out my phone and captured the pictures attached.  the photos were taken with an iphone 3gs.

we're used to seeing all kinds of military aircraft around this area, but there is no way in hell this was a plane, helicopter, or ariel flare.  i'm hoping others in the area saw it too, because it was so bright, clear and visible that if someone looked up, it couldn't be missed. 

anyhow, i have no idea what it was, but i've never seen anything like it in my life.
content.summary: Extremely bright blue glowing orb hovering, moving just below and to north of moon at 10:30pm tonight, 9/12/11.

content.detailedDescription: On the 9th i was working in downtown rock island doing a disconnect for a local cable company. my partner and i were in the alley of 7th st just off 5th ave. while my partner was on the ladder working on the line i was on the street. this incident took place around 2pm in the afternoon. the sky was clear with few high clouds. as i looked down the alley to the north about 500ft to 1500ft up i saw 20 to 25 objects moving left to right and in a swirl motion. at first i thought they were balloons, but they did not look right, then i thought they may bee birds but i could not see wings flapping as you would with a flock of birds. i said to my coworker "what the hell is that?" he looked and didn't see them at first. i said there! then he noticed them as they were moving closer in a southwest direction still with the swirling around each other motion. he said he couldn't figure out what they were either. he also asked a lady in the alley if she could see them and she said yes but did not know what they were. they were about 30ft across and the sun glinted off of them. they left like a haze or almost like they were moving through water and leaving a slight wake. we watched them for about 5mins until we had to leave to go to another job. i know this sounds odd as it was at the time of the sighting since it was in broad day-light. i also know what we saw moved with purpose. i am also a member of mufon. so i don't just freak out at everything i see in the sky. the strangest part of all of all this is that i took out my phone which is a android that shoots pictures in hd. i snapped 2 photos of the objects which i know for a fact were visible on the screen before i took the pictures after examining the photos none of the objects appear in either frame. this is very strange to me. i would like to know if anyone in this area also sighted these objects and i have uploaded the photos. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Objects in sky during daylight

content.detailedDescription:
My son noticed the three red cylindrically-shaped balls/orbs at 9:10 pm across the road hovering in a triangle formation above the neighbors barn they were so low the barn was glowing and a fourth ball/orb appeared. he ran in the house to have my husband and myself see them. i watched them go into a singularly path that angled, they made no sound or noise. all were independent of each other i went to get the camera, my camera would not work, every time i tried it would not work. the stayed in a line and started to change from red to orange and finally to a pale yellow and disappeared. they did not take off or shoot away the vanished. about 5 mintues later as we were still looking a fifth red ball/orb appeared alone just hovering again very low just above the trees, this one you could see a ring of lights which we assume was the underside, it also turned to an orange to pale yellow and was gone.
all three of us were stunned and could not believe what we had just watched, the camera wold not work during the time they were there and the camera worked fine after.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 5 red orbs form triangle shape above barn then change formation into a line.
